title: Sonic Generations Collection

notes: Can confirm that adding <<PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%>> to launch options fixes both the audio issues and crash on exit. Framerate dips occasionally, but otherwise runs fine. Controller works as well.
title: Sonic Generations Collection

notes: Sound issues can be fixed by adding "PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%" to launch options. Sometimes portions of a level will fail load and be invisible; frame rate is stable with occasional drops.
title: Sonic Generations Collection

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.8-041808-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes:
Set the launch option as

PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% -popupwindow
title: Sonic Generations Collection

notes: Game works perfectly if you use launch command PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%
title: Sonic Generations Collection

notes: "pROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%" fixes the choppy sound and framerate, but most character models are either partially or fully invisible, which makes beating some levels hard.
title: Sonic Generations Collection

notes: Works flawlessly after setting the launch options to PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% -popupwindow
title: Sonic Generations Collection

notes: Worked with Xbox 360 controller. Need to add launch options: PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% -popupwindow
title: Sonic Generations Collection

notes: The game works perfectly after disable esync and using wine d3d11, without this options it's unplayable and have no sound.
title: Sonic Generations Collection

notes: The game render perfectly but with a extremely low framerate. GTX1080 in 1080p only gets 30fps
title: Sonic Generations Collection

notes: Game runs great. Could be whitelisted if configured to disable Esync by default. Disabling Esync (PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1) fixes an issue with audio. You do NOT need to disable DXVK for the game to run, if you have Vulkan drivers capable of transform feedback installed and are running Proton 3.16-1 or higher.
title: Sonic Generations Collection

notes:
Works fine! Worked with Xbox 360 controller.
In rare moments there is little drop in FPS, but the performance is almost Platinum.
Need to add launch options: PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% -popupwindow
title: Sonic Generations Collection

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 570 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-34-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: Though I didn't test it for long, it almost worked perfectly without the tweaks (except audio glitches, and exit glitches), with the tweaks it works perfectly. Just add "PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% -popupwindow" to your launch options
title: Sonic Generations Collection

notes: Played through many zones. Everything works fine once Esync is disabled. There is no need to set "PROTON_NO_D3D11=1" and no need to add the "-popupwindow" flag to the startup options. I am using the following in my startup options:  "PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%" .
title: Sonic Generations Collection

notes: Pretty close to perfect. Disabling Esync was the only tweak needed to get sound working properly.
title: Sonic Generations Collection

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 520 (Skylake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes:
After disabling ESYNC, the sound works properly.
NOTE: If the save button does not appear, you need to hide the bottom bar (MATE gui).
title: Sonic Generations Collection
